column4: How do I open ports with Linux, like for torrents etc? I tried installing firestarter but it crashes on me...
really?? I haven't had any issues with it. When does it crash?
I uninstalled it now, but it was after the first screen, just when I pressed 'next'. I'm using a server install of breezy w/ xubuntu installed, that might affect it
I'm not sure.. I assume you have all the gome libs etc?
